programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Louis van Gaal staat bekend als trainer van grote clubs als Ajax, Barcelona, Bayern München en Manchester United. Maar in zijn spelerscarrière stond één club centraal: Sparta Rotterdam. In deze documentaire wordt teruggeblikt op de jaren 1978 tot 1986, de prachtige jaren van Sparta, met Louis van Gaal als vaste waarde.

programme.title: ESPN DOC
programme.desc: Louis van Gaal staat bekend als trainer van grote clubs als Ajax, Barcelona, Bayern München en Manchester United. Maar in zijn spelerscarrière stond één club centraal: Sparta Rotterdam. In deze documentaire wordt teruggeblikt op de jaren 1978 tot 1986, de prachtige jaren van Sparta, met Louis van Gaal als vaste waarde.

programme.desc: Louis van Gaal staat bekend als trainer van grote clubs als Ajax, Barcelona, Bayern München en Manchester United. Maar in zijn spelerscarrière stond één club centraal: Sparta Rotterdam. U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2021
programme.desc: The official film of the 2021 US Open from the coastal course of Torrey Pines, setting the stage for Jon Rahm to ride a wave of victory in the Golden State of California.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf R1 Highlights
programme.desc: The opening round of the US Open from Oakmont Country Club. Last year, Bryson DeChambeau snatched the second of his two US Open wins, capitalising on Rory McIlroy's late collapse. (12.06)

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2022
programme.desc: The official film of the 2022 US Open - the year England's Matt Fitzpatrick completed a nine-year journey, becoming only the second man to win a US Amateur and US Open on the same course.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf R1 Highlights
programme.desc: The opening round of the US Open from Oakmont Country Club. Last year, Bryson DeChambeau snatched the second of his two US Open wins, capitalising on Rory McIlroy's late collapse. (12.06)

programme.title: Golf Academy: Monty Full Swing
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, former European Tour star Colin Montgomerie offers tips on the full swing.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Monty Driver
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, former star Colin Montgomerie offers advice on using the driver.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf R1 Highlights
programme.desc: The opening round of the US Open from Oakmont Country Club. Last year, Bryson DeChambeau snatched the second of his two US Open wins, capitalising on Rory McIlroy's late collapse. (12.06)

programme.title: In Bloom: The Justin Rose Story
programme.desc: A look at Justin Rose's momentous victory in the 2013 US Open. The Englishman discusses both the highs and lows that prepared him for success at Merion Golf Club.

programme.title: HotelPlanner Tour Golf
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the HotelPlanner Tour's visit to Lucerne for the Swiss Challenge at Golf Sempach.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf R1 Highlights
programme.desc: The opening round of the US Open from Oakmont Country Club. Last year, Bryson DeChambeau snatched the second of his two US Open wins, capitalising on Rory McIlroy's late collapse. (12.06)

programme.title: HotelPlanner Tour Golf
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the HotelPlanner Tour's visit to Lucerne for the Swiss Challenge at Golf Sempach.

programme.title: PGA Tour Originals: Tiger 2000
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at one of the most iconic seasons in golf as Tiger Woods changed the landscape of the sport securing nine victories, including three Major championships.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf R1 Highlights
programme.desc: The opening round of the US Open from Oakmont Country Club. Last year, Bryson DeChambeau snatched the second of his two US Open wins, capitalising on Rory McIlroy's late collapse. (12.06)

programme.title: Live U.S. Open Golf Round 2
programme.desc: The second round of the 125th US Open Championship. JJ Spaun led the way Thursday with a flawless opening round, while Scottie Scheffler and Rory McIlroy felt the bite of Oakmont.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2023
programme.desc: The official film of the 2023 US Open from Los Angeles Country Club - a year in which the moment arrived for Wyndham Clark to win his first major championship.
